aliases: The Binder of Spirits, The Breaker of Dark Spells, The Promised One, Talisman

marvel.description: Dr. Michael Twoyoungmen was a surgeon who found that modern science was insufficient to accomplish everything he wished to do, and so he turned to mysticism that his grandfather told him about.

name: Shaman
powersText: Carries a medicine bag which contains a pocket dimension
Can summon anything needed from the bag
